gameplaySubtitle1: A fast paced Play to Earn
gameplayChooseText: Each hero has abilities and power cards. Every season new NFT cards will appear.
gameplayWinText: Play to get #HAR tokens and become a game investor. Use #HAR to get NFT’s or redeem it for real money.
gameplayGetText: Get virtual land from different planets and build forges, extractors, etc… Grow your status from Colon to Emperor!
